name: Loudbounce
tag_list: drag-and-drop-website-builder, online-shopping-cart, shopping-cart-software, multi-channel-ecommerce-platform, merchant-ecommerce-software, social-ecommerce
overview:
Loudbounce’s flagship hosted software solution, CARTfm, automates selling through marketplaces and micro-networks by effectively matching and directing traffic from storefronts, social pages and niche-properties to merchant product listings, attributes and imagery with over 500 times the demographic specificity of macro-networks (Google & Facebook etc.).

Leveraging AJAX architecture and proprietary algorithms, CARTfm enables small and mid-sized businesses to communicate new and/or relevant products to sought after niche-marketplaces, social pages and personal sites where average order values and loyalty rates are over 50X the values of traditional marketplaces.

We deliver SaaS (Software-as-a-Service) and PaaS (Platform-as-a-Service) solutions that allow businesses to effectively reach and grow their customer base, maximize their human capital, capture and exploit their business intelligence – all in the rapid, cost-effective, simple manner today’s business climate demands.

We have designed and developed a modular software system that provides customers with the elements needed to maximize ROI along the ecommerce spectrum, from the simple to the most complex.

While most ecommerce platform providers focus on shopping cart software, Loudbounce thinks ‘outside the cart,’ bottom line- no matter how impressive your website or how functional your cart software is, it comes down to driving prospective customers to your site and converting traffic to revenue.

Loudbounce teams creativity and talent with intuitive technologies, powerful computing and market experience to deliver software solutions and automated tools that meet the real ecommerce needs of small businesses and end-users, alike.

All Loudbounce platform modules are feature rich, characterized by seamless, automated software assembly and database management.

A key part of the Loudbounce philosophy is to take an agnostic approach. Our flexible functional software is designed to be scalable and functional across all platforms and architectures.

This agnostic approach enables our customers to maximize the benefits of our proprietary integrated ecommerce solution while without being excluded from effective third party solution providers.
